title.rendered: INTECH clinches ‘Innovation Excellence in Industrial Cybersecurity award’ at Aramco’s MEICA 2023

content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]On an evening graced by the royalty of Middle East’s energy industry and reserved for celebrating technological brilliance, INTECH proudly took its place on the podium as the winner of ‘Innovation Excellence in Industrial Cybersecurity’ amidst a grand-stand finish to Aramco’s MEICA 2023 awards in the Grand Hyatt, Al Khobar.

Masood Akram, INTECH’s Country Director for the Kingdom, received the prestigious honor from Fawaz AlSahan, Senior Engineering Consultant & Chairman of Instrumentation Standards at Aramco.

Immediately after receiving the award, a visibly delighted Masood expressed with a beaming smile, “This award, from the largest energy player in the world, is a beautiful recognition of our tireless services towards making the Kingdom’s critical energy infrastructure secure, at a time when the nation is driving towards fulfilling our leaders’ vision for a technologically superior and modern Saudi Arabia in 2030”.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″]

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]Ammad Baig, INTECH’s GM for Cybersecurity & Digital Solutions, appreciated the award and shared his thoughts “This is a massive shoutout to the Cybersecurity Team’s brilliance and dedication. Particularly over the last three four years, we have gathered the most brilliant minds from all around the globe who are being supervised and trained by seasoned professionals while serving energy giants like Aramco”.

Huseyn Tarek, INTECH’s Regional President, was buoyed by the occasion and offered his gratitude to the dignitaries, “On behalf of the entire company, and particularly our brilliant OT Cybersecurity division, I remain grateful to the dignitaries for choosing us. It is a remarkable reflection of their trust in our capabilities as a company. Their generous appreciation of our services towards making their operations & assets safe is a proud privilege.”[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
